steps.name: Let's get everything we need!
steps.description: Detergent? Fabric softener? Coins? Laundry basket? Clothespins?

steps.name: Now's the time to sort your laundry, if you're into that sort of thing.
steps.description: Lights/darks? Delicates?

steps.name: Time to visit the washing machine!
steps.description: Add your detergent, plus anything else you like in there.

steps.name: All done?
steps.description: Transfer your washed laundry to the dryer or drying rack.

steps.name: All dry?
steps.description: Try putting on some music or your favourite TV show -- lets fold this laundry, and put it in groups of items that belong together.

steps.name: Everything's folded!
steps.description: Pick up each pile of folded laundry and bring it to its home.

steps.name: All done!
steps.description: You did it! This task is DONE! Amazing job!

steps.name: Let's get everything we need:
steps.description: Glass cleaner? Toilet cleaner? Toilet brush? Rubber gloves? Cloths or paper towel? Broom? Garbage bags?

steps.name: Let's see that beautiful face!
steps.description: Spray and wipe the mirror.

steps.name: Clean the counter and the sink.
steps.description: Try putting everything from the countertop into the sink, so you can spray and wipe the countertops. Then put everything back, and spray and wipe the sink.

steps.name: Don't forget the faucet!
steps.description: Spray and wipe the faucet and handles.

steps.name: Let's scrub the toilet.
steps.description: Add some toilet bowl cleaner to the bowl, if you like, and let it sit while we clean the rest of the toilet.

steps.name: Let's scrub the toilet.
steps.description: Spray and wipe the toilet, working from top to bottom. Dont forget to get under the seat!

steps.name: Let's scrub the toilet.
steps.description: Now you can use the toilet brush to scrub the the cleaner we put inside of the bowl.

steps.name: Wipe down that shower or bath.
steps.description: Spray and wipe the shower faucet and handles.

steps.name: Wipe down that shower or bath.
steps.description: Use your preferred cleaner to wipe down the walls, and tub if you have one.

steps.name: Wipe down that shower or bath.
steps.description: If you have a detachable shower head, use it to rinse the walls and tub.

steps.name: Empty the garbage.
steps.description: Don't forget to replace the bag

steps.name: Sweep the floors
steps.description: Pick up any clutter, and sweep the bathroom floor.

steps.name: Tidy your shelves and surfaces
steps.description: Put everything in its place.

steps.name: Test that squeaky clean mirror.
steps.description: Check out your beautiful smile in the mirror. So fresh and so clean, clean!

steps.name: All done!
steps.description: You did it! This task is DONE! Amazing job!

steps.name: Let's get everything we need:
steps.description: Gloves? Dish brush, scrubby, or cloth? Dish soap? Drying rack? Clean towel?

steps.name: Clear off your drying rack
steps.description: Make sure all your clean dishes are put away.

steps.name: Organize the dirty dishes
steps.description: Put similar dishes in stacks or groups, and make room in the sink for washing. Make sure any leftover food is emptied out!

steps.name: Time to start scrubbing!
steps.description: Try putting on some music or your favourite TV show. Sit on a stool or a chair, if standing feels difficult.

steps.name: Time to start scrubbing!
steps.description: Scrub each dish thoroughly with your brush or cloth, using hot, soapy water. Rinse, and put on the rack to dry.

steps.name: Time to dry.
steps.description: Dry your dishes with a clean towel. Or, let them dry on the rack.

steps.name: Put those dishes away!
steps.description: Put your beautifully clean and dry dishes back where they live.

steps.name: All done!
steps.description: You did it! This task is DONE! Amazing job!
